info.name: User Data API - Advanced Caching & Monitoring
info.description: Complete API collection with advanced caching, rate limiting, async processing, and Prometheus metrics

request.description: Simple health check to verify API is running
Detailed health check with service status, cache stats, and memory usage
First request - should take ~200ms (simulated database delay)
Second request - should be fast <10ms (from cache)
Should return 400 Bad Request with validation error
Create a new user - will be automatically cached
View cache statistics: size, hits, misses, hit rate, average response time
Prometheus metrics endpoint - HTTP requests, cache performance, database queries, etc.

request.description: Make 11+ requests quickly to trigger rate limit (429 error). Limit: 10 req/min with burst of 5 in 10 seconds
Get API information and available endpoints
